quotes.quote: The happiness of your life depends upon the quality of your thoughts.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.quote: The obstacle is the way.
quotes.author: Seneca

quotes.quote: Waste no more time arguing about what a good man should be. Be one.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.quote: He who fears death will never do anything worthy of a living man.
quotes.author: Seneca

quotes.quote: It is not death that a man should fear, but he should fear never beginning to live.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.quote: If it is not right, do not do it. If it is not true, do not say it.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.quote: Luck is what happens when preparation meets opportunity.
quotes.author: Seneca

quotes.quote: The soul becomes dyed with the color of its thoughts.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.quote: We suffer more often in imagination than in reality.
quotes.author: Seneca

quotes.quote: No person has the power to have everything they want, but it is in their power not to want what they don't have, and to cheerfully put to good use what they do have.
quotes.author: Seneca

quotes.quote: The wise man is always similar to himself.
quotes.author: Seneca

quotes.quote: If you are distressed by anything external, the pain is not due to the thing itself but to your own estimate of it; and this you have the power to revoke at any moment.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.quote: He who is brave is free.
quotes.author: Seneca

quotes.quote: The first step to wisdom is silence. The second is listening.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.quote: Wealth consists not in having great possessions, but in having few wants.
quotes.author: Epictetus

quotes.quote: Don’t explain your philosophy. Embody it.
quotes.author: Epictetus

quotes.quote: The greater the difficulty, the more glory in surmounting it.
quotes.author: Epictetus

quotes.quote: Wealth consists not in having great possessions, but in having few wants.
quotes.author: Epictetus

quotes.quote: He who is not a good servant will not be a good master.
quotes.author: Seneca

quotes.quote: We are more often frightened than hurt; and we suffer more from imagination than from reality.
quotes.author: Seneca

quotes.quote: The good or ill of a man lies within his own will.
quotes.author: Epictetus

quotes.quote: No man is free who is not a master of himself.
quotes.author: Epictetus

quotes.quote: Difficulties strengthen the mind, as labor does the body.
quotes.author: Seneca

quotes.quote: You have power over your mind - not outside events. Realize this, and you will find strength.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.quote: It is not the man who has too little, but the man who craves more, that is poor.
quotes.author: Seneca

quotes.quote: What progress, you ask, have I made? I have begun to be a friend to myself.
quotes.author: Hecato

quotes.quote: Associate with people who are likely to improve you.
quotes.author: Seneca

quotes.quote: The soul becomes dyed with the color of its thoughts.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.quote: It is not the man who has too little, but the man who craves more, that is poor.
quotes.author: Seneca

quotes.quote: If you really want to escape the things that harass you, what you’re needing is not to be in a different place but to be a different person.
quotes.author: Seneca

quotes.quote: He who fears death will never do anything worthy of a living man.
quotes.author: Seneca

quotes.quote: Control your emotions or they will control you.
quotes.author: Horace

quotes.quote: A gem cannot be polished without friction, nor a man perfected without trials.
quotes.author: Seneca

quotes.quote: Don't seek for everything to happen as you wish it would, but rather wish that everything happens as it actually will—then your life will flow well.
quotes.author: Epictetus

quotes.quote: To be everywhere is to be nowhere.
quotes.author: Seneca

quotes.quote: Learn to be indifferent to what makes no difference.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.quote: The greater the difficulty, the more glory in surmounting it.
quotes.author: Epictetus

quotes.quote: The best revenge is not to be like your enemy.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.quote: He who has a why to live can bear almost any how.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: No person has the power to have everything they want, but it is in their power not to want what they don't have, and to cheerfully put to good use what they do have.
quotes.author: Seneca

quotes.quote: It is not death that a man should fear, but he should fear never beginning to live.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.quote: The greatest obstacle to living is expectancy, which hangs upon tomorrow and loses today.
quotes.author: Seneca

quotes.quote: Wealth consists not in having great possessions, but in having few wants.
quotes.author: Epictetus

quotes.quote: If you really want to escape the things that harass you, what you're needing is not to be in a different place but to be a different person.
quotes.author: Seneca

quotes.quote: No man is free who is not a master of himself.
quotes.author: Epictetus

quotes.quote: Happiness and freedom begin with a clear understanding of one principle: Some things are within our control, and some things are not.
quotes.author: Epictetus

quotes.quote: The first step in the acquisition of wisdom is silence, the second listening, the third memory, the fourth practice, the fifth teaching others.
quotes.author: Solomon Ibn Gabirol

quotes.quote: There is only one way to happiness and that is to cease worrying about things which are beyond the power of our will.
quotes.author: Epictetus

quotes.quote: The whole future lies in uncertainty: live immediately.
quotes.author: Seneca

quotes.quote: I have often wondered how it is that every man loves himself more than all the rest of men, but yet sets less value on his own opinions of himself than on the opinions of others.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.quote: True happiness is to enjoy the present, without anxious dependence upon the future.
